short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interact with Chromebooks in the classroom

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sparrow allows a student to join a classroom space in which their teacher can share links, messages and resources to the student's computer while also reviewing the websites that are visited while the student is in class.
